original_text: Abram lived in the land of Canaan, while Lot lived among the cities of the plain and pitched his tents near Sodom.
korean_text: 아브람은 가나안 땅에 거주하였고 롯은 그 지역의 도시들에 머무르며 그 장막을 옮겨 소돔까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: Abram lived in the land of Canaan
while Lot lived among the cities of the plain
and pitched his tents near Sodom
